member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.Droid.Activate(Android.Content.Context)
member.summary: Activates the support classes for Android
member.param: The main context of the Android application
member.exception: Thrown if versions of Couchbase.Lite and Couchbase.Lite.Support.Android do not match

member.name: M:Couchbase.Lite.Support.Droid.EnableTextLogging
member.summary: [DEPRECATED] Enables text based logging for debugging purposes. Log statements will be printed to logcat under the CouchbaseLite tag.
